title: Technopathy
description: Bertie likes to live a natural life and he doesn't trust technology, especially the latest craze: a device that essentially gives its users technological telepathy. What will he do when technopathy goes wrong, and the nanobots that are supposed to fix any malfunctions seem to be malfunctioning themselves? How will he survive when the latest craze turns its users into techno-zombie crazies?
author: Chantal Boudreau
